document_name: Regulation 1/2012 amending reg. 15/2010 - Priority Development Renewable Energy Projects
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2020/IDN-2020-01-13-Regulation 1_2012 amending reg. 15_2010 - Priority Development Renewable Energy Projects_aa60847b7e425598beaec90a296aed5b.pdf
document_description: The regulation of the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources amends the regulations number 15 of 2010 concerning the list of planning projects for development of the construction of power plants and associated companies.
